nodes.bodyText: Maybe another way to reuse this part? "new" everytime seems not a good practise.
The prefix of Management doesn't necessary since this is already under management package.
@tanyi, @xccc-msft, you might look at the first two chapters of this book: https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/effective-java-3rd/9780134686097/ch2.xhtml#lev2
this(options, configuration) , but not duplicate code

commit.message: fix: use build user agent in base class, instead of new base class
fix: change default constructor to default instance
